name: anwar
comment: Durability: overstrike protection where fiberglass handles are most prone to break Improved grip during use: over mold grip Driving and pulling nails

comment: Forged steel head for superior durability ProTouch grip for maximum comfort even after prolonged use Smooth face leaves fewer marks on surfaces
